product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mountain Monkey Tech Jacket - Men's
long_description: Windproof, water-resistant and tough, the men's Mountain Hardwear Mountain Monkey Tech Jacket sports a combination of polyester fleece and soft-shell fabric for versatile use on outdoor adventures. AirShield(TM) Elite fleece and Deflection(TM) soft shell provide windproof, breathable protection for hiking, climbing, kite-flying and other fun on brisk, windy days. Zippered handwarmer pockets; zippered chest pocket. Dual hem cords on the Mountain Hardwear Mountain Monkey Tech Jacket let you seal warmth in, weather out.
short_description: Windproof, water-resistant and tough, the men's Mountain Hardwear Mountain Monkey Tech Jacket sports a combination of polyester fleece and soft-shell fabric for versatile use on outdoor adventures.
